main event: A fast-moving object, possibly a balloon or aircraft, was observed over Bermuda on February 23, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 25 seconds and the object moved parallel to the observer's heading of 107 degrees., The object was reported moving at a speed in excess of 1500 knots., The observers described the object as resembling a big comet., There was a possibility the sighted object could have been a meteor due to its characteristics., The sighting was part of a Project Blue Book UFO report.
witness description: various military personnel involved in the report
